Take a step towards closing your mortgage and apply today.

Easy, Fast, Secure.

Applying for a mortgage has never been easier. Simply answer a few questions and upload requested documents directly from your mobile device, tablet or desktop. It's easy to stay in touch with your loan team and to track your progress along the way.

How does the mortgage application process work?

Your personal loan advisor will guide you through the entire process, keeping you on track and answering any additional questions you may have.

Start Your Application

  • Apply online with the digital Emblem mortgage application. You will answer a few questions to determine the right mortgage for you.
  • Easily connect your bank account and credit information directly within the Emblem loan portal.
  • Upload any additional documents simply by taking a photo of them.

Participate in the financial and property review

What do I need to apply?

You should expect to provide the following documents in addition to basic financial information:

  • Tax Returns
  • W2's
  • Paystubs
